Topic.Title: Looking for a game with a time as the title.

Posts.EditableText:
hi all, 

I remember a while back I was browsing TV Tropes, when I found a text-based game where the title was a time (like, 8:44 or something like that). Does anyone know what exactly it was called? 

Thanks ahead!!!
